item.title: [a23] Smogbelcher Chariot
item.description:
Artifact — Vehicle

Menace, deathtouch, lifelink

Whenever Smogbelcher Chariot attacks, target creature that crewed it this turn perpetually gains your choice of menace, deathtouch, or lifelink.

Crew 3

item.title: [a23] Ghitu Embercoiler
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Prowess

At the beginning of your precombat main phase, you may discard a card. If you do, seek a card with greater mana value and exile it. Until the end of your next turn, you may platy the exiled card.

item.title: [a23] Goblin Influx Array
item.description:
Enchantment

Goblin spells you cast cost {R} less to cast. (If it doesn't require {R}, it costs {1} less to cast.)

At the beginning of your end step, conjure a random card from Goblin Influx Array's spellbook into your hand.

item.title: [a23] Goblin Morale Sergeant
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Soldier

Haste

Enlist

Whenever enlists a nontoken creature, you may conjure a duplicate of that creature into the top five cards of your library at random. The duplicate perpetually gets +1/+0 and gains haste.

item.title: [a23] Spellchain Scatter
item.description:
Instant

Kicker {U}

When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, conjure a duplicate of that spell into your hand. If this spell wasn't kicked, discard the duplicate at the beginning of your next end step.

item.title: [a23] Marwyn's Kindred
item.description:
Sorcery

Conjure a card named Marwyn, the Nurturer and X cards named Llanowar Elves onto the battlefield.

item.title: [a23] Nantuko Slicer
item.description:
Creature — Insect

Kicker {B}

When Nantuko Slicer enters the battlefield, return target card from your graveyard to your hand. If this spell was kicked, conjure a duplicate of target card in an opponent's graveyard into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."

item.title: [a23] Vinesoul Spider
item.description:
Creature — Elemental Spider

Reach

At the beginning of your end step, put a random land card from your library into your graveyard.

item.title: [a23] Wandering Treefolk
item.description:
Creature — Treefolk

Vigilance

Domain — {7}{G}: See a creature card. This ability costs 1 less to activate for each basic land among lands you control.

item.title: [a23] Arvad, Weatherlight Smuggler
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Knight

Deathtouch, lifelink

At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, Arvad, Weatherlight Smuggler perpetually gets +X/+X where X is the number of creatures that died this turn. This ability also triggers is Arvad is in your graveyard.

item.title: [a23] Bloodsprout Talisman
item.description:
Artifact

Bloodsprout Talisman enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}, Pay 1 life: Choose a nonland card in your hand. It perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} less to cast."

item.title: [a23] Darigaaz, Shivan Champion
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dragon

Flying

At the beginning of your end step, conjure a random card from Darigaaz, Shivan Champion's spellbook into exile face down with three egg counters on it. It gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, if this card is exiled, remove an egg counter from it. Then if it has no egg counters on it, put it onto the battlefield."

item.title: [a23] Juggernaut Peddler
item.description:
Creature — Human Artificer

Vigilance

When Juggernaut Peddler enters the battlefield, target player reveals all nonland cards in their hand. You may choose one of those cards. If you do, that player exdiles it and conjures a card named Juggernaut into their hand.

item.title: [a23] Niambi, Beloved Protector
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Cleric

Flash

When Niambi, Beloved Protector enters the battlefield, choose target nonlegendary creature card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Return it to the battlefield. It perpetually gains "Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn."

item.title: [a23] Protean War Engine
item.description:
Artifact — Vehicle

As Protean War Engine enters the battlefield, draft a card from Protean War Engine's spellbook and exile it. Whenever Protean War Engine becomes crewed, until end of turn, it becomes a copy of the exiled card, except it's a Vehicle artifact in addition to its other types.

Crew 3

item.title: [a23] Slimefoot, Thallid Transplant
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Fungus

Whenever a Swamp or Forest enters the battlefield under your control, draft a card from Slimefoot, Thallid Transplant's spellbook.

item.title: [a23] Teferi's Contingency
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell. Each creature card in its controller's graveyard, hand, and library with the same name as that spell perpetually gains "This spell costs {2} more to cast."

item.title: [a23] Tiana, Angelic Mechanic
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Angel Artificer

Flying

When Tiana, Angelic Mechanic or another legendary creature you control crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle perpetually gets +1/+0.

item.title: [a23] Vodalian Tide Mage
item.description:
Creature — Merfolk Wizard

Whenever one or more nontoken creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, choose one of those creatures. Conjure a duplicate of the chosen creature into your hand.

item.title: [a23] Coalition Construct
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

As enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

Coalition Construct is the chosen type in addition to its other types.

When enters the battlefield, other creatures you control of the chosen type and creature cards of that type in your hand perpetually get +1/+1.

item.title: [dmr] Time Stretch
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player takes two extra turns after this one.

item.title: [dmr] Time Stretch
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player takes two extra turns after this one.

item.title: [dmr] Tatyova, Benthic Druid
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Merfolk Druid

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

item.title: [dmr] Sneak Attack
item.description:
Enchantment

{R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [dmr] Swords to Plowshares
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

item.title: [dmr] Swords to Plowshares
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

item.title: [dmr] Sneak Attack
item.description:
Enchantment

{R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [slc] Shark Typhoon
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create an X/X blue Shark creature token with flying, where X is that spell's mana value.

Cycling {X}{1}{U} ({X}{1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

When you cycle Shark Typhoon, create an X/X blue Shark creature token with flying.

item.title: [slc] Necropotence
item.description:
Enchantment

Skip your draw step.

Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.

Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

item.title: [slc] Chrome Mox
item.description:
Artifact

Imprint — When Chrome Mox enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonartifact, nonland card from your hand.

{T}: Add one mana of any of the exiled card's colors.

item.title: [slc] Birthing Pod
item.description:
Artifact

({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)

{1}{G/P}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [slc] Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Bolas

+2: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

+1: Each opponent exiles two cards from their hand.

−4: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh deals 7 damage to target opponent, creature an opponent controls, or planeswalker an opponent controls.

−12: Exile each nonland permanent your opponents control.

item.title: [slc] Elspeth, Sun's Champion
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Elspeth

+1: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

−3: Destroy all creatures with power 4 or greater.

−7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have flying."

item.title: [slc] Bloodbraid Elf
item.description:
Creature — Elf Berserker

Haste

Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

item.title: [p30a] Kor Haven
item.description:
Legendary Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}{W}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.

item.title: [p30a] Vindicate
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target permanent.

item.title: [p30a] Exalted Angel
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

Whenever Exalted Angel deals damage, you gain that much life.

Morph {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.title: [p30a] Temple of the False God
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}{C}. Activate only if you control five or more lands.

item.title: [p30a] Eternal Witness
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [p30a] Chord of Calling
item.description:
Instant

Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)

Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [p30a] Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dragon Wizard

Flying

Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to any target.

{T}: Draw a card.

item.title: [p30a] Tarmogoyf
item.description:
Creature — Lhurgoyf

Tarmogoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

item.title: [p30a] Glen Elendra Archmage
item.description:
Creature — Faerie Wizard

Flying

{U}, Sacrifice Glen Elendra Archmage: Counter target noncreature spell.

Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

item.title: [p30a] Acidic Slime
item.description:
Creature — Ooze

Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

item.title: [p30a] Terastodon
item.description:
Creature — Elephant

When Terastodon enters the battlefield, you may destroy up to three target noncreature permanents. For each permanent put into a graveyard this way, its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

item.title: [p30a] Hornet Queen
item.description:
Creature — Insect

Flying

Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

When Hornet Queen enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with flying and deathtouch.

item.title: [p30a] Harvester of Souls
item.description:
Creature — Demon

Deathtouch

Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may draw a card.

item.title: [p30a] Kalonian Hydra
item.description:
Creature — Hydra

Trample

Kalonian Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.

Whenever Kalonian Hydra attacks, double the number of +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

item.title: [p30a] Goblin Rabblemaster
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Warrior

Other Goblin creatures you control attack each combat if able.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste.

Whenever Goblin Rabblemaster attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

item.title: [p30a] Dragonlord Atarka
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elder Dragon

Flying, trample

When Dragonlord Atarka enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers your opponents control.
